==UseCases==


= ReadDocument =


|| Use Case || ReadDocument ||
||Identified || TS3 ||
|| Description: || The ReadDocument use case models a Teacher or Student viewing a document on VINYL. ||
||Actors|| User (Includes Teacher and Student) ||
|| Preconditions: || 1. User must be successfully logged in via the LogIn use case. ||
||Flow of Events: ||1. The use case starts when User selects View Document. ||
||                ||2. User will be asked to select a class from list of options. ||
||                ||3. A list of documents for that class will be displayed. ||
||                ||4. User selects an document to view. ||
||Post Condition: || 1. The selected document will be displayed.||
